captions.text: -If you want to understand why I'm not answering this question, lets go back to nine months ago.
-I don't want to get up for breakfast
-Do you remember the first time we were classmates?
-I was not a pervert...I was precocious
-Welcome to your last first day of school and...
-What are you doing idiot? Take off your hat!
-I presume you already know what you want to do next...since this will be the last year of school you have to figure out your useless future
-I studied my entire life to be able to do this...
FIRST HUMAN EVER TO ENTER HOGWARTS SCHOOL
DISCOVERS ALIENS BY ACCIDENT. HE SAYS "THEY'RE FRIENDLY"
FLUSHES THE TOILET AND DISCOVERS ATLANTIS
-You can go. I'm sure that loony of your gymnastic teacher is waiting for you
-I don't care you're wearing jeans!! You have to run!! Run!!!
-Hey you!! Your feet have to move from the ground!! Run!! Did you hear me? Run!!!
-I want my pencil back, is that clear?
-So what did you guys do last summer?
-I'd like you to meet Fabrizia, she's Italian American and she doesn't really understand our language
-We'll always remember the first week of our last year of high school because we all dated the same girl
-You're our 100 customer so your lunch is free today
-I don't know...pizza for her too, and water...a lot of water...
-You want some ketchup on your fries?
-...tell me about youself...oh God why did I ask her out?
-She telling you about her life so, say yes and smile
-Imagine this...four friends...in love with the same girl...
-It takes just one smile...one sight...one touch to...
-We could all kiss her...but there's something more important
-Friendship is that thing that keeps the four of us together
-...it takes one smile...one sight...one touch...to understand...that you're not the one who's right for her...
-Unless your best friend is a di*ç
-A ring bell in a resturant? Amazing!
